class CGOBFrame

Constructors and Destructors
CGOBFrameSet default values and add system buttons.
Operations
SetText Set the title bars text.
Overridables
BringToFrontBrings widget to the front of the drawing and processing list.
MoveMoves a frame and all its children.

Data Members
private
CGOBButton* m_CloseButton;Close button.
BOOL m_ExitButton;Flag specifies if we have an exit button.
BOOL m_IsDragging;Flag tells us if window is dragging.
BOOL m_IsMinimized;Flag tells us if widget is in minimized state.
